climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: Contains: 2- 50 Pod Bags of Grab Green Stoneworks Oak Tree Laundry Detergent Pods (100 Pods Total)

Naturally Effective: Specifically formulated to cut through dirt leaving your laundry clean and fresh. Free of any phosphates, chlorine or dyes, these EPA Safer Choice Certified pods work on all water temperatures in standard and HE machines

Oak Tree: Our convenient, pre-measured pods provide a bold and spicy natural fragrance. Just drop one in your washer and deep-clean, remove stains, and soften naturally while remaining gentle on clothing

No Harsh Chemicals: Our Stoneworks collection is the the perfect balance of plant and mineral-based ingredients to ensure the best laundry detergent without phosphates, phthalates optical brighteners, sulfates, parabens or dyes

Safer for You, Your Family and the Planet: Grab Green's plant and mineral-based formulas are made with responsibly-sourced, high-quality ingredients that are proudly cruelty-free, never tested on animals and made in the USA
body.description: Formulated with the perfect balance of plant and mineral-based ingredients, our Stoneworks Laundry Detergent Pods are pre-measured, concentrated powder pods that clean deeply, eliminate odors, fight stains and soften naturally, without any phosphates, phthalates optical brighteners, sulfates, parabens or dyes. The bold and spicy Oak Tree fragrance is made with cedarwood, cinnamon, geranium and patchouli essential oils. Our unique, light-weight paper-sack packaging is printed with water-based inks. Thoughtful package design includes a “squeeze and sniff here” to sample the fragrance (or fragrance free), our EPA Safer Choice certification, and clear use instructions. We believe in full ingredient disclosure—what we call True Transparency—which is why we list every ingredient and the purpose for each ingredient on every package. To protect your family, we developed our powder pods to contain multiple layers of safety: simple, white powder pods don't look like irresistible colorful candy. They are difficult to swallow. Grab Green is a female and mother owned and operated company that provides naturally derived and non-toxic laundry, home cleaning, and personal care products 100% made in the USA. Our products are eco-responsible and ensure safe and effective cleaning power for a healthy, happy home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Philosophy Simply Cleaning is not only about what you remove, but what you add as well. As a mother of two daughters and two furry four-legged doggies, having a safe and healthy home was always Patricia Spencer’s top priority. Trusted, go to products. We’re all for that. Grab Green Stoneworks Laundry Detergent Pods A Positively Innovative Laundry Experience Grab Green Stoneworks Laundry Detergent Pods Paragraph: At Grab Green our goal is to take the chore out of laundry and replace it with a little joy, and a whole lot of healthy clean. The pouches feature hand-drawn illustrations & touches of metallic accents. On the Inside—Powerful powder pods in a range of earthy fragrances, and Fragrance Free Rain. Cleans deeply, eliminates odors, fights stains and softens naturally Available in 4 earthy fragrances + fragrance free Rain Perfectly pairs with Stoneworks Dryer Sheets: same load size/same fragrances Formulated for standard & high-efficiency machines; works in all temperatures Made in the USA with domestic & imported components

Effective We’ve invested years into scientific development to find the right balance of plant and mineral based ingredients that ensure safe and effective cleaning power! Our concentrated non-toxic formulas are packed with power and are formulated to go beyond existing eco-responsible products and compete with conventional products. We love our planet and take every opportunity to use packaging that is recyclable, sustainably harvested, and that utilizes post consumer resins. Our goal is to use as few materials as possible. We also love animals, and make sure our formulas are never tested on them! Healthier At Grab Green we believe in true Transparency, we want you to know what’s in each product and why. That’s why you’ll find a complete list of ingredients on every product. We promise that our products are made with non-toxic ingredients - no phthalates, solvents, ammonia, phosphates, fillers, optical brighteners, masking agents or dyes. *Certified Effective/Naturally Derived Formula by EPA 02/2018 Fragrant Our fragrances are designed to envelop you in the beauty of nature. Each has been hand-crafted using essential oils to awaken the mood you seek and leave you feeling enlivened and rejuvenated. Effective Healthier Fragrant

5 Piece Mini Sample Kit Olive Leaf Laundry Pod and Dryer Sheet Kit Rain Laundry Pod and Dryer Sheet Kit Birch Branch Dryer Sheets Oak Tree Dryer Sheets Rose Petal Dryer Sheets Naturally Derived Ingredients ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Non-Toxic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Effective Formula ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Recyclable Packaging ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Animal Testing and Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Patricia’s Tips Maintain the rich colors of your dark clothes longer by washing them inside out—this will keep them from fading as quickly giving longer life to those beautiful darks. What’s in a cycle? Regular or 'normal' cycle combines fast agitation with a fast spin cycle and is great for heavily-stained items, cottons, linen, denim, towels, and bedding. About 90 percent of the energy associated with doing laundry involves just heating up the water. The solution: Turn that dial to warm instead of hot—and voila! You’ve just decreased your carbon footprint. Nice work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s more versatile than expected, and it’s a keeper.
reviews.reviewText: We recently purged chemical cleaning and home supplies from the property, and this was one of three brands of laundry detergent tried (I tried the variety sampler pack in these first, and I’ve since gotten two full-sized bags of these pods in different scents), the other two being liquids. I don’t have concerns over these ingredients, and the smell is good, clean, non-irritating, and nature-derived - it really makes our conventional brands seem even more chemical-laden and makes their toxic scents seem far worse. These rarely leave residue despite our hard water and being powdery in the pods; I’ve never had any brand/type not occasionally leave some residue, especially on certain dark fabrics, so that’s no big deal - it brushes off, can be rinsed, or often it comes off in the dryer. They sometimes don’t dissolve fully on light-agitation washes, but they still clean, just leaving a tidy, hard clump of detergent. This clump is usable for another smallish load, and it’ll clean just as well and impart the fresh scent - I consider these two-for pods many times! While the fresh clean scent stays but isn’t annoying (even stronger scent would be fine to me since there are no dangerous chemicals here), it endures and reactivates once folded laundry is brought back out. I like all the scent varieties (plain, or what’s dubbed rain, I don’t use because I want some fragrance), but I haven’t bought my favorites in big sizes yet because some other scents have been more economical for the same amount of product. It’s amazing this rose-scented one is indeed floral and rosy, yet uses a smart combination of essential oils to create this scent, not even using oil of roses or relative scent rose geranium; that’s cool chemistry at work. These are well done and now a regular purchase for us. As long as Grab Green keeps up this good work and value, there’s no need to change now I’ve found a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Discovering this detergent has been a game-changer for me! It has quickly become one of my all-time favorites. The delightful fragrance, coupled with its gentle yet effective cleaning elements, has successfully prevented any irritation to my skin. What sets it apart is the lasting freshness it imparts to my clothes—something I rarely find in other detergents. Surprisingly, even scents that typically linger longer than I prefer have become a welcome feature because of the captivating aroma.The variety of scents offered is impressive, each contributing to a delightful laundry experience. Not only does it leave my clothes impeccably clean, but the fragrance also lingers for just the right amount of time. It's a rare balance that's hard to find, and this detergent nails it. The pleasant scent adds an extra layer of satisfaction to the entire laundry routine. I wholeheartedly recommend this detergent to anyone seeking a perfect blend of cleanliness, skin-friendliness, and long-lasting fragrance in their laundry essentials. It's a must-try for those who appreciate both functionality and a touch of luxury in their everyday chores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS STUFF ! SMELLS GREAT AND REMOVED VERY OLD STAINS !!!
reviews.reviewText: Olive leaf is my favorite! I even got the dryer sheets. It’s a great natural and neutral smell. That’s why I’ve purchased 6 times now. But….surprisingly….it got old stains out. I was so pleasantly surprised !!! My dog had hurt her foot and got blood on her sheet. It’s been washed several times since with our old “super stain remover “ detergent. I washed it this weekend with this, not expecting any different results …..then I realized when I was making her little bed …the stains were gone !!! YAY ! Made me love this even more !!!!! Also , love the packaging! No bulky containers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are okay
reviews.reviewText: I got this trial packet to test the scents and if I liked them or not. They arrived and one was slightly opened and the powder coming out, which was fine. Then another broke open, and another... they don't seem to stay in the pod. I don't know if they got damaged during shipping or what. the scent didn't stay on the clothes after washing, which is sad but fine. The soap itself smells good and is clean. the olive is the best scent. Also wash on warm or hot, they don't dissolve in cold like at all. I eventually just ripped the pod open and dumped it in. I wouldn't buy again. I wish they would come out with normal powder cleaner in these scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this company! These laundry pods smell great, clean my clothes, and I feel good knowing no harsh chemicals are coming into contact with my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good to determine which scents you want full sizes of
reviews.reviewText: Not worth it. There's so few in the bag, however, It's a great way to test run the sense so you don't end up with a bag of something you don't like. The rows one is hideous. The oak one is the best. The olive leaf one is also very good. They are musky, so if you like floral or citrus they won't be for you. The oak one smells like an expensive hotel, I love it. They clean well toiz better than most bougie laundry detergent but not as good as say, Persil, which is imo the best detergent for cleaning, but these are still very good, as well as delicious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing For Ultra-Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, it smells great. I ordered the rose scent. Secondly, these pods are just amazing. My jeans, leggings and sweaters would always make my legs itch like crazy with regular laundry pods (Gain brand) and it was awful! I have yet to have those issues with these pods and I've used them regularly for a few weeks. I wash my clothes very often and haven't had any problems with soap residue or the pods not dissolving fully. Plus, the pods are eco-friendly and the bag is paper which is wonderful. I always feel guilty throwing out those huge plastic containers that traditional laundry pods come in. This is a MUST buy for anyone!
This is an amazing product. I love it! There is no C.O.D. at the door if you buy it from the Canadian website.

The product was excellent &even at the high price, I would love to buy more, but the C.O.D at the door was never mentioned. It only discouraged me from wanting to invest in such an amazing product. It is a shame because I really love the rose scent

reviews.reviewTitle: Absolutely awful product and seller refunded in the end.
reviews.reviewText: I read about this product in a forum where the people were talking aout various launrdy detergents. I had been searching for info about Amway's SA8 and, based on various comments that had mentioned Grab Green's product, decided to get this product instread. What a mistake! I followed the instructions for a top loader and put 2 pods into the bottom of the machine, loaded my quite dirty laundry into it and set it on the wash I needed. Afterwards I placed the laudry into the drier. After the drier finished I took ut the items and was immediately struck by how little the laundry had been cleaned. In particular a dirty bedsheet came out exactly the same as before it had gone in. To say I was shocked is an understatement. The seller, to their credit, refunded me the cost after I had explained to them what had happened as they had initially wanted the product back unopened. I would not in a million years ever use this product after whyat I experienced and am going to throw the rest of the product out into the garbage. Needless to say, I am having the SA8 powder sent to me from England by my sister. Why? Because it cleaned all the blood out of my polo shirt, shorts and even canvas shoes (after a misshap I had) when I tried it. Never had that happen with ANY powder.
